examples: ‘What does your sister do?’ ‘She's a dentist.’
Doesn't she (= the woman we are looking at) look like Sue?
¿No se parece ella (= la mujer que estamos mirando) a Sue?
Think about a friend or family member. What kind of person is he or she?
Piense en un amigo o familiar. ¿Qué tipo de persona es él o ella?
